segment.content:
Ekol Logistics is a global logistics company, founded by Ahmet Musul in
1990, and currently operates in 12 countries. Ekol embraces a multicultural workforce
with employees from 23 different nationalities and is recognized for its innovative
approach, closely following technological advancements through automation in its
operations. During my internship at Ekol, I had the opportunity to work in the
Methods Engineering department, where I gained significant experience in enhancing
the efficiency of logistics operations. The focus of my internship was to measure and
analyze operational efficiency and productivity through time studies, layout planning,
and process optimization, aiming to identify methods to improve productivity based
on the analysis results.
Throughout the one-month period, I collaborated with the Operational
Excellence department and contributed to various professional projects. This
collaboration helped me understand how interconnected logistics processes are and
how they collectively contribute to overall operational efficiency. During my
internship, I observed processes such as warehouse operations, goods receipt, picking,
packing, and shipping. I collected process measurements, which I later analyzed
under specific categories. I utilized tools like Visio to design layouts and attempted to
optimize existing workflows. Additionally, I participated in the Pallet Routing
Project, which significantly increased the efficiency of the shipping process. As a
result of this project, efficiency in Operation B improved by 313%.
During my internship, I had the opportunity to apply theoretical knowledge to
real-world logistics challenges. I enhanced my competencies in process measurement
and analysis, teamwork, process improvement, and operations and facility design.
Through weekly meetings, I closely monitored progress and participated in data-
driven decision-making processes aimed at improving operational performance.
Furthermore, I built a professional network, establishing important connections for
my future career.
2
Bu doküman Genel olarak sınıflandırılmıştır. This document is classified as Public.

score.feedback: Özet, şirketin faaliyetlerini, stajyerin görevlerini ve öğrenilenleri belirtiyor. Beklentiler ve sonuçlar hakkında bilgi mevcut ancak sentez zayıf. Şirket ve aktiviteye özgü bazı detaylar var, ancak daha fazla sentezleme yapılabilirdi. Verimlilik artışı gibi spesifik sonuçlar belirtilmiş.
